briefTitle: Study in Women With Idiopathic Menorrhagia to Determine the Reduction in Menstrual Blood Loss (MBL) After Treatment With the Levonorgestrel-releasing Intrauterine System (IUS)

armGroups.label: Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System (LNG IUS) 20Âµg per 24 hours

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women who have \>/= 80 mL blood loss during their menstrual cycles and desire contraception

Exclusion Criteria:

* Post menopausal menstrual cycle \< 21 days or \> 35 days
* Pregnancy

outcomeMeasures.title: The Change in Absolute Value From Baseline Menstrual Blood Loss (MBL) to the End-of-study MBL (Cycle 6)
outcomeMeasures.description: The MBL for each cycle included intermenstrual bleeding in addition to withdrawal bleeding. Baseline MBL was the composite MBL measured during each of the cycles during the Screening Phase. End-of-study MBL was measured during Cycle 6 of the Treatment Phase.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Patients With Successful Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: End-of-study MBL \< 80 mL and a decrease to a value no greater than 50% of the Baseline MBL was considered to be treatment success.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline MBL to End of Study MBL (Cycle 6)
outcomeMeasures.description: The percent change = {(End of Study MBL - Baseline MBL)/Baseline MBL} x 100.

outcomeMeasures.title: Absolute Change From Baseline MBL to Mid-study MBL (Cycle 3)
outcomeMeasures.description: The MBL for each cycle included intermenstrual bleeding in addition to withdrawal bleeding. Mid-study MBL was measured during Cycle 3 of the Treatment Phase.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline MBL to Mid-study MBL (Cycle 3)
outcomeMeasures.description: The percent change = {(Mid-study MBL - Baseline MBL)/Baseline MBL} x 100.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects Who Completed the Study in Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System (LNG IUS) Group
Total Number of Bleeding Days
outcomeMeasures.description: In the LNG IUS group, each cycle has 30 days. In the MPA group, each menstrual cycle starts on the 1st bleeding day (withdrawal bleeding) and lasts until the last non-bleeding day before next withdrawal bleeding starts.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Number of Spotting and Bleeding Days
outcomeMeasures.description: In the LNG IUS group, each cycle has 30 days. In the MPA group, each menstrual cycle starts on the 1st bleeding day (withdrawal bleeding) and lasts until the last non-bleeding day before next withdrawal bleeding starts.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Number of Spotting Days
outcomeMeasures.description: In the LNG IUS group, each cycle has 30 days. In the MPA group, each menstrual cycle starts on the 1st bleeding day (withdrawal bleeding) and lasts until the last non-bleeding day before next withdrawal bleeding starts.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Number of Bleeding Episodes
outcomeMeasures.description: A bleeding episode is defined as a light, normal or heavy bleeding, during a minimum of one day. In the LNG IUS group, each cycle has 30 days. In the MPA group, each menstrual cycle starts on the 1st bleeding day (withdrawal bleeding) and lasts until the last non-bleeding day before next withdrawal bleeding starts.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Patients With Improvement in the Investigator Global Assessment Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: "Improved" is classified as 'very much improved', 'much improved', or 'improved' and "not improved" is classified as 'no change', 'worse', 'much worse', or 'very much worse'

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Patients With Improvement in the Patients Overall Assessment Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: "Improved" is classified as 'very much improved', 'much improved', or 'improved' and "not improved" is classified as 'no change', 'worse', 'much worse', or 'very much worse'.
